summary: A bullied teenager comes back from the dead to take revenge on his classmates.
cast: Alex Pettyfer|April Pearson|Dimitri Leonidas|Calvin A. Dean|Tuppence Middleton|Georgia King|Mary Nighy|Olly Alexander|James Krishna Floyd|Sophie Wu|Hugh Mitchell|Larissa Wilson|Ruby Bentall|Tom Hopper|Peter Amory|Geoff Bell|Ben Lloyd-Hughes|Roger Ashton-Griffiths|Sandra Dickinson|Kenneth Collard|Andrea Newland|Peter Le Breuilly|Jon Carver|Louise Mardenborough|Sarah Moonan|Christopher Shepherd|Adam Lawrence|Ruth Curtis|David Pibworth|Chris Wilson
title: Tormented
